channel.title: Lucas Sobral
channel.description: Simplifying technology, one line of code at a time.

item.title: Creating A Small Data Pipeline Using Dynamodb And Lambda Functions On Aws
item.description: In This Project We Will Create A Small Pipeline Inside The Aws Enviroment Using The Free Tier For Practicing Aws Tools.

item.title: Building a High-Performance and Interactive Data Application with Streamlit and DuckDB
item.description: This project involves the development of a data-driven web application using Streamlit for the front-end interface and DuckDB as the core data engine. The application is designed to offer a seamless and interactive user experience for data reports.

item.title: Scrapping football data from optaplayerstats.statsperform.com
item.description: This tutorial will demonstrate how to develop a Python program using Selenium and BeautifulSoup to extract data from the Opta Player Stats statistics platform.

item.title: Apache Airflow Using Docker
item.description: Tutorial explaining how to install Apache Airflow using Docker.

item.title: Obtaining the Most Listened Tracks on Spotify with Apache Airflow
item.description: In this tutorial, we will use Apache Airflow to orchestrate a data pipeline that retrieves the most listened-to tracks worldwide and saves them in a MongoDB cluster.
